thread.title: Poonam Pandey sizzles in black at an awards gala in - Entertainment
thread.title_full: Poonam Pandey sizzles in black at an awards gala in Mumbai - Entertainment

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: Poonam Pandey sizzles in black at an awards gala in - Entertainment
text:
Poonam Pandey at the awards event 
Poonam Pandey always grabs the limelight with her bold moves and statements. Bollywood starlet Poonam Pandey made a head-turning entry at an advertising firm awards event in Mumbai.
Poonam sported a sparkly black dress at the event. Check out the photos

Poonam Pandey poses for the photographers at the awards gala 

Poonam Pandey at the awards gala. Pics/Yogen Shah 
Poonam Pandey recently attended Paris Fashion Week
